word: G2735 - κατόρθωμα - katórthōma - kat-or'-tho-mah - Very worthy deed

sections.paragraph: a right action, a successful achievement
Part(s) of speech: Noun Neuter / பெயர்ச்சொல் (அஃறிணை)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From a compound of G2596 and a derivative of G3717 (compare G1357); something made fully upright, that is, (figuratively) rectification (specifically good public administration): - very worthy deed.
